raw: Allow BS-IV vehicle registration till March 31: SIAM in a plea to SC .

raw: Auto industry body , Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers ( SIAM ) has filed an application in the seeking directions to ensure that sale or registration of vehicles are allowed till the cut - off date of March 31 , 2020 .
replaced: Auto industry body , Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers ( SIAM ) has filed an application in the seeking directions to ensure that sale or registration of vehicles are allowed till the cut - off date of March 31 , 2020 .

raw: This is after some state governments recently issued circulars directing that no applications for registration of vehicles be accepted on or after a certain date , which are much ahead of March 31 , 2020 .
replaced: This is after some state governments recently issued These circulars  March 31 , 2020 .

raw: The cut - off dates range from February 29 , 2020 to March 25 , 2020 from state to state , though BS - VI Emission compliance is mandated from April 1 , 2020 .

raw: “ These circulars have put the customers , dealers and vehicle manufacturers in severe discomfort , as each of them is racing against time to exhaust the stocks which are with the dealers , ” stated Rajan Wadhera , President , The has directed that no BS - IV vehicle will be sold or registered from 1st April 2020 .

raw: This comes at a time when automakers , particularly two - wheeler makers are already finding it tough to liquidate the stock of vehicles with the older emission technology owing to the slowdown in the economy .
